# diffusiontest: Network Analysis for Diffusion of Innovations

This package contains functions useful for analyzing network data for diffusion of innovations applications.

The package was developed as part of the paper Thomas W. Valente[^correspondingauthor], Stephanie R.
Dyal, Kar-Hai Chu, Heather Wipfli, Kayo Fujimoto, *Diffusion of innovations theory applied to global tobacco control treaty ratification*,
Social Science & Medicine, Volume 145, November 2015, Pages 89-97, ISSN 0277-9536
(available [here](http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S027795361530143X))

[^correspondingauthor]: Corresponding author tvalente at usc.edu

Functions include selection, susceptibility & infection, etc.

## Installation

Using the `devtools` package, you can install `diffusiontest` dev version as follows

```r
devtools::install_github('USCCANA/diffusiontest')
```
